requirement_tested: A game lobby interface displaying available game rooms, current game status, and player information
user_persona: A casual poker enthusiast looking to find an available game quickly.
user_goal: To browse the lobby and identify an open game room with available seats.

narrative_steps.title: Entering the Lobby
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the poker website and logs in. She lands on the lobby page which shows a list of available game rooms.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the lobby page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The lobby loads with a grid of game room cards showing room names, statuses, and player lists on a azure background with midnight blue cards.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Rooms
narrative_steps.description: Sarah scans the room cards, noting which rooms have open seats and are currently in the 'waiting' status.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over a room card to see extra details.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The hovered card shows additional information like creation time and creator with a subtle shadow effect.

narrative_steps.title: Selecting a Room
narrative_steps.description: Finding a suitable room, Sarah clicks on the card to join it.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a room card labeled 'Open' with available seats.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Sarah is navigated to the selected game room interface.

requirement_tested: Functionality to create or join game rooms
user_persona: A regular player who prefers hosting private games with friends.
user_goal: To create a new private game room and share it with friends.

narrative_steps.title: Initiating Room Creation
narrative_steps.description: Mark wants to host a game night and decides to create a private room for his friends.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Create Room' button in the lobby.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A modal form appears asking for room details.

narrative_steps.title: Configuring the Room
narrative_steps.description: Mark fills in the room name and sets the maximum players to 6.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in room name and select player limit, then submit the form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form validates inputs and submits successfully, creating a new room entry in the database.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Created Room
narrative_steps.description: After submitting, Mark expects to be taken directly to his newly created room.
narrative_steps.action: Submit the create room form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Mark is redirected to the newly created game room where he waits for friends to join.

requirement_tested: A Texas Hold'em poker table interface showing player hand cards, community cards, and betting information
user_persona: A competitive online poker player focused on game strategy.
user_goal: To view their hand and the community cards to make informed decisions during gameplay.

narrative_steps.title: Entering the Game Room
narrative_steps.description: Jessica joins a room and takes a seat at the poker table.
narrative_steps.action: Enter a game room and wait for the game to start.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The poker table interface loads with placeholders for cards and betting information on an azure background with midnight blue elements.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Hole Cards
narrative_steps.description: As the game begins, Jessica eagerly awaits her hole cards.
narrative_steps.action: Wait for the initial card deal.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The component fetches Jessica's hand cards via API and displays them face down in her designated position.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Community Cards
narrative_steps.description: During the flop round, community cards are revealed.
narrative_steps.action: Observe the center of the table as community cards are dealt.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Three community cards appear in the center of the table, updating in real-time as the game progresses.

requirement_tested: Interactive action buttons for game moves such as fold, check, call, raise, and bet
user_persona: An intermediate poker player making strategic moves.
user_goal: To make a calculated raise during a key moment in the game.

narrative_steps.title: Waiting for Turn
narrative_steps.description: Robert watches the game progress and waits for his turn to act.
narrative_steps.action: Wait until it's his turn to make a decision.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The action buttons remain disabled until it's Robert's turn.

narrative_steps.title: Deciding to Raise
narrative_steps.description: Seeing a strong hand, Robert decides to raise the current bet.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Raise' button.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: An input modal appears prompting Robert to enter the raise amount.

narrative_steps.title: Executing the Raise
narrative_steps.description: Robert enters his desired raise amount and confirms the action.
narrative_steps.action: Enter raise amount and confirm submission.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The raise action is sent to the backend via API, updating the pot and Robert's chip count accordingly.

requirement_tested: Real-time chat functionality within game rooms
user_persona: A social player who enjoys chatting with opponents.
user_goal: To engage in friendly banter with other players during a game break.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Chat
narrative_steps.description: During a break between hands, Lisa notices the chat sidebar and decides to say hello.
narrative_steps.action: Locate the chat sidebar and click on the text input field.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The chat sidebar is visible with previous messages displayed and an active input field ready for typing.

narrative_steps.title: Sending a Message
narrative_steps.description: Lisa types a greeting and sends it to the group.
narrative_steps.action: Type 'Good luck everyone!' and press Enter.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The message is transmitted via WebSocket and instantly appears in the chat display area for all players.

narrative_steps.title: Receiving Responses
narrative_steps.description: Lisa waits to see if anyone responds to her message.
narrative_steps.action: Monitor the chat display for incoming messages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New messages from other players appear in real-time without requiring a page refresh.

requirement_tested: User authentication and account management system
user_persona: A new user excited to start playing online poker.
user_goal: To register for a new account and log in for the first time.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Registration
narrative_steps.description: Alex visits the site for the first time and wants to create an account.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Register' button on the homepage.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A registration form with midnight blue themed inputs appears.

narrative_steps.title: Completing Registration
narrative_steps.description: Alex fills out the registration form with personal details.
narrative_steps.action: Enter username, email, and password, then submit the form.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The form validates inputs and creates a new user entry in the database, issuing a JWT token upon successful registration.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: After registering, Alex logs in to access the game lobby.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to login page, enter credentials, and click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Alex is authenticated and redirected to the lobby page with a personalized welcome message.

requirement_tested: Capability to view past game records and history
user_persona: A stats-oriented player who likes to analyze performance.
user_goal: To review the results of a recent tournament game.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing History Page
narrative_steps.description: After finishing a game, Tom wants to see how he performed.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the game history section from the user profile menu.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tom sees a tabular list of past games showing dates, results, and chip changes.

narrative_steps.title: Finding Specific Record
narrative_steps.description: Tom looks for a particular game he played earlier that day.
narrative_steps.action: Scan the history list and click on the relevant game record.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The selected record expands or navigates to a detailed view showing full game progression.

narrative_steps.title: Analyzing Results
narrative_steps.description: In the detailed view, Tom examines the final hands and betting sequence.
narrative_steps.action: Review the detailed game log and final hand rankings.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Complete game information including all player actions and final outcomes is displayed accurately.

requirement_tested: Frontend that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A tech-savvy user concerned about application performance.
user_goal: To ensure the application loads fresh data without any hard-coded values.

narrative_steps.title: Initial Data Load
narrative_steps.description: Pat opens the lobby page and expects to see real-time data.
narrative_steps.action: Load the lobby page for the first time.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Loading indicators appear briefly before live game room data is fetched and displayed from backend APIs.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Dynamic Content
narrative_steps.description: Pat checks that player information updates dynamically.
narrative_steps.action: Observe player lists in room cards as players join or leave.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Player information updates in real-time without manual refresh, confirming API-driven content.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Authentication Flow
narrative_steps.description: Pat logs out and back in to verify session handling.
narrative_steps.action: Log out and then log back in using valid credentials.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Authentication process correctly exchanges credentials for tokens and fetches user profile data from protected API endpoints.

requirement_tested: Backend service connecting to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer deploying the application for production use.
user_goal: To verify the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Service
narrative_steps.description: DevOps engineer starts the backend service with configured environment variables.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend service with correct DB_HOST, DB_PORT, DB_USERNAME, DB_PASSWORD, and DB_NAME values.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Application initializes successfully and establishes a connection pool to the PostgreSQL database without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Testing Database Operations
narrative_steps.description: The engineer tests basic database operations to confirm connectivity.
narrative_steps.action: Execute a simple query through an API endpoint that accesses the database.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Query executes successfully through the established connection pool, returning expected data from the database.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Data Persistence
narrative_steps.description: Confirm that game data is properly saved to the database.
narrative_steps.action: Create a new game room and check database records.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: New room entry is created in the database with correct information matching the API request.

requirement_tested: Responsive UI design with azure page background and midnight blue elements
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the poker site on a smartphone.
user_goal: To navigate the site comfortably on a small screen device.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Site on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Jamie opens the poker site on their smartphone browser.
narrative_steps.action: Visit the homepage using a mobile device.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site layout adjusts to fit the mobile screen with azure background and midnight blue interactive elements maintained.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Elements
narrative_steps.description: Jamie taps on various buttons and links to navigate.
narrative_steps.action: Tap on lobby buttons and navigation links.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Elements respond appropriately to touch interactions with consistent color scheme and proper sizing for mobile.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Visual Consistency
narrative_steps.description: Jamie verifies that the visual theme remains consistent across different pages.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate between lobby, game room, and profile pages.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All pages maintain the azure background and midnight blue element colors regardless of screen size.

requirement_tested: Real-time synchronization of game state across all players in a room
user_persona: A player in a multiplayer game expecting seamless gameplay.
user_goal: To experience synchronized game actions with other players.

narrative_steps.title: Joining a Multiplayer Room
narrative_steps.description: Four players including Max join the same game room and connect to the WebSocket channel.
narrative_steps.action: Enter a game room with multiple players.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All players establish WebSocket connections to the room-specific channel for real-time updates.

narrative_steps.title: Observing Synchronized Actions
narrative_steps.description: As one player makes a bet, Max watches to see if it reflects immediately for everyone.
narrative_steps.action: Watch the table as another player places a bet.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The bet action appears simultaneously for all players with updated pot and chip counts shown instantly.

narrative_steps.title: Confirming Consistent State
narrative_steps.description: Max checks that all players see identical game information.
narrative_steps.action: Compare visible game state with other players' views.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All players observe identical community cards, pot values, and player positions in real-time.

requirement_tested: Player seating and position management at the poker table
user_persona: A new player joining an ongoing game session.
user_goal: To select an available seat and understand their position at the table.

narrative_steps.title: Joining Table with Occupied Seats
narrative_steps.description: Taylor enters a room where some seats are already taken.
narrative_steps.action: Look for available seats at the poker table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The table displays 8 positions with clear indicators of occupied and empty seats.

narrative_steps.title: Choosing a Seat
narrative_steps.description: Taylor selects an open seat to join the game.
narrative_steps.action: Click on an 'Empty Seat' placeholder.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Taylor is assigned to that seat position and appears in the player list for others.

narrative_steps.title: Understanding Position Roles
narrative_steps.description: Taylor checks their role in the current hand.
narrative_steps.action: Look for dealer button and blind indicators near their seat.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Clear visual indicators show Taylor's position relative to dealer and blinds for the upcoming hand.

requirement_tested: Chip tracking and betting mechanics implementation
user_persona: A strategic player managing their chip stack carefully.
user_goal: To place a bet and verify accurate chip deductions.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Chip Balance
narrative_steps.description: Before making a move, Casey reviews their available chips.
narrative_steps.action: Look at the chip stack display next to their player position.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Current chip count is clearly displayed next to Casey's seat with accurate value matching database.

narrative_steps.title: Placing a Bet
narrative_steps.description: Casey decides to call the current bet during their turn.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Call' button when it becomes active.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Chips are deducted from Casey's stack and added to the current pot with correct amounts reflected immediately.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Pot Distribution
narrative_steps.description: After winning a hand, Casey expects to receive the correct chip payout.
narrative_steps.action: Win a hand and observe chip distribution.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Pot chips are automatically distributed to Casey's stack based on winning hand strength and side pot calculations.

requirement_tested: Game logic engine handling Texas Hold'em rules and hand evaluation
user_persona: A rule-conscious player expecting fair gameplay.
user_goal: To have their hand correctly evaluated according to Texas Hold'em rules.

narrative_steps.title: Playing a Complete Hand
narrative_steps.description: Drew participates in a full hand from pre-flop to showdown.
narrative_steps.action: Play through all betting rounds and reveal cards at showdown.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System correctly progresses through dealing phases, betting rounds, and timing of community card reveals.

narrative_steps.title: Hand Evaluation
narrative_steps.description: At showdown, Drew's hand is compared against opponents.
narrative_steps.action: Reveal cards and await hand evaluation results.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System accurately evaluates Drew's hand strength using standard poker rankings and determines correct winner.

narrative_steps.title: Rule Enforcement
narrative_steps.description: Drew attempts an illegal action to test validation.
narrative_steps.action: Try to call a bet with insufficient chips without going all-in.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: System prevents the invalid action and prompts Drew to either go all-in or fold according to Texas Hold'em rules.

user_persona: A frequent user who stays logged in across multiple sessions.
user_goal: To maintain authenticated access without repeated logins during active use.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Authenticated Session
narrative_steps.description: Jordan logs in and begins playing several games.
narrative_steps.action: Log in successfully and navigate between different sections.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Session token is issued and used for subsequent API requests, keeping Jordan logged in across navigation.

narrative_steps.title: Extending Session Through Activity
narrative_steps.description: Jordan continues playing actively, expecting session to persist.
narrative_steps.action: Perform various actions like joining rooms, chatting, and playing hands.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each activity extends session lifetime, preventing automatic logout during active gameplay.

narrative_steps.title: Handling Inactivity Timeout
narrative_steps.description: After stepping away, Jordan returns to find session expired.
narrative_steps.action: Return to the site after extended inactivity period.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Inactive session has expired and Jordan is automatically redirected to the login page.
